forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
